title: Mobile App Development: Native vs Cross-Platform Solutions

sections.title: Native vs Cross-Platform
sections.markdown:
# Mobile App Development

Compare native and cross-platform development approaches, exploring the trade-offs between performance, development speed, and user experience.

> "Choose the right tool for your team."

[Mobile Dev Guide](https://developer.android.com/guide)

sections.title: Comparison Table
sections.markdown:
## Comparison

| Approach        | Performance | Speed | UX         |
|----------------|-------------|-------|------------|
| Native         | High        | Slow  | Excellent  |
| Cross-Platform | Medium      | Fast  | Good       |

:::alert
**Note:** Consider your audience!
:::
